template_description: Standard template for service_architecture.json files based on UAF definitions
purpose: Regulates the motion of planets, stars, and galaxies; drives formation of large-scale structures.

interfaces.name: Gravitational Interaction
interfaces.description: Gravity is the force by which a planet or other body draws objects toward its center. It governs the motion of celestial bodies and the structure of the universe.
interfaces.source_verification: Existing - verified by authoritative sources. See: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gravity, https://www.nasa.gov/audience/forstudents/5-8/features/nasa-knows/what-is-gravity-58.html
